intro: Xerotia, commonly known as the desert lily, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions. It belongs to the genus Xerotica within the family Amaryllidaceae. The plant is characterized by its thick, fleshy leaves and showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that bloom in the evening. Xerotia is adapted to survive in dry environments through mechanisms such as deep root systems and water storage tissues.
